name: man playing water polo: medium-light skin tone

bn:00080622n: A water sport consisting of two teams of swimmers who have to throw the ball into the opponents goal.
Sport played in water by teams competing to put the ball into the opponent's goal
A game played in a swimming pool by two teams of swimmers who try to throw an inflated ball into the opponents' goal
Water polo is a team water sport.
A team water sport, which can be best described as a combination of swimming, handball and wrestling.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The man playing water polo emoji on Apple devices showcases dynamic action with a medium-light skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading.  He's depicted mid-throw, his form sculpted by realistic lighting that emphasizes muscle definition and the splash of water around him.  The soft, rounded edges of his athletic build and the glistening droplets highlight the vibrant energy of the sport, often used to convey enthusiasm for swimming, competition, or water-based activities.
